member.name: IMFSourceReaderCallback.OnEvent
member.summary: Called when the source reader receives certain events from the media source.
member.param: For stream events, the value is the zero-based index of the stream that sent the event. For source events, the value is MF_SOURCE_READER_MEDIASOURCE.
A pointer to the interface of the event.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT value. Currently, the source reader ignores the return value.

member.name: IMFSourceReaderCallback.OnFlush
member.param: The index of the stream that was flushed, or MF_SOURCE_READER_ALL_STREAMS if all streams were flushed.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT value. Currently, the source reader ignores the return value.

member.name: IMFSourceReaderCallback.OnReadSample
member.param: The status code. If an error occurred while processing the next sample, this parameter contains the error code.
The zero-based index of the stream that delivered the sample.
A bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.
The time stamp of the sample, or the time of the stream event indicated in dwStreamFlags. The time is given in 100-nanosecond units.
A pointer to the interface of a media sample. This parameter might be NULL.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT value. Currently, the source reader ignores the return value.

member.name: IMFSourceReaderCallback
member.summary: Callback interface for the Microsoft Media Foundation source reader.
